@ECDC_EU @EuroHIVtestweek thank you for having me :)
@ECDC_EU @PositiveLad Thanks for all your questions during #talkHIV. If more contact us at hie.rigshospitalet@regionh.dk
@ECDC_EU It's better to know your status. TALK HIV. TEST HIV.
.@ECDC_EU @EuroHIVtestweek Go get tested. EVERY result is a good result. It allows you to either stay -ve, or access care if +ve. #talkHIV
.@ECDC_EU my initial treatment had some unpleasant side effects on sleep & mood, I was able to change to something more suitable #talkHIV
.@ECDC_EU the clinic that diagnosed me booked me into the local HIV clinic immediately as to avoid losing me in the system. #talkHIV
.@ECDC_EU @EuroHIVtestweek it's key to involve public figures and celebrities. Normalisation of convo around testing is invaluable #talkHIV
@ECDC_EU Check out our ETW Facebook group at  http://t.co/lvLYKC6zRr for live updates from #EuroHIVtestweek participators #talkHIV
@ECDC_EU Yes, this is a great way to engage with #EuroHIVtestweek participants across Europe & stay informed of their activities #talkHIV
@ECDC_EU, when do you think HIV tests will be quick and possible to do without waiting months after the possible infection date? #talkHIV
@ECDC_EU Support and unite community organisations to scale-up HIV testing and share lessons learned between countries #talkHIV
@ECDC_EU Make more policy makers aware of socioeconomic benefits of HIV testing & how to evaluate HIV testing practices #talkHIV
@ECDC_EU Encourage healthcare professionals to offer an HIV test as part of routine care in specific settings and conditions #talkHIV
@ECDC_EU Testing should be offered to individuals exposed to HIV or who present with indicator conditions http://t.co/MVmbIy6BI5 #talkHIV
.@ECDC_EU When I was single I decided I should get tested every 6 months. It was a routine test that diagnosed me. #talkHIV
.@ECDC_EU many MSM don’t identify as “gay” or “bisexual” either, so a more open effort needed to not alienate people. #talkHIV
.@ECDC_EU we also need to change how and where we focus our efforts. Almost all hook-ups start online & via apps. #talkHIV
.@ECDC_EU I think it’s important to focus on MSM but not to the detriment of other communities or the population at large. #talkHIV
@ECDC_EU they are left to work things out from porn, the internet and rumours. These are not a good source of information. #talkHIV
@ECDC_EU I think the problem is a lack of appropriate sex & relationship education in school for young gay & bi men. #talkHIV
